circumstances: The pilot was attempting a 180° turn to reverse direction away from lowering clouds and snow showers when the right wing dug into the snow covered terrain. The pilot stated a virtual 'white out' condition existed at the time. The pilot was uninjured and the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Occurrence #1: in flight collision with terrain/water
Phase of operation: maneuvering - turn to reverse direction
Findings
1. (f) weather condition - snow
2. (f) weather condition - whiteout
3. (c) vfr flight into imc - inadvertent - pilot in command
4. (c) proper altitude - not maintained - pilot in command
